description: This Java source file defines a REST controller class 'AuthController' for handling user authentication endpoints such as register, login, and logout in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: A REST controller providing authentication-related endpoints such as user registration, login, and logout.

classes.name: AuthController.ErrorMessage
classes.description: A nested static class used to structure error message responses.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles new user registration requests, creating a user and returning user info or error messages.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a token along with user info if successful.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Revokes a provided bearer token to log out the user.
